translation.en: Why you sitting here monologuing, drinking up my whiskey,
translation.it: Perché parla con me e beve il mio whisky

translation.en: when you should be out rounding up your little deputies?
translation.it: invece di radunare i suoi sottoposti?

translation.en: 'Cause he been pardoned, Nat.
Rufus Buck been absolved of his countless depredations.
translation.it: Non dovrà più rispondere dei suoi innumerevoli saccheggi.

translation.en: Seeing as I've been scouring the terrain looking for bank robbers and such,
translation.it: Essendo sempre in giro a scovare rapinatori di banche e simili,

translation.en: that particular piece of news failed to reach me.
translation.it: non ho avuto modo di essere informato.

translation.en: What they sayin'?
Something about guns, killin'.
Why you let that kid take my gun? What kinda stupid rule is that?
translation.it: Perché io ho dovuto lasciare la pistola? Che razza di regola è?

translation.en: -Should be four guns pointing at-- -Shut up, Pickett.
You shoot, he dead.
You miss, all y'all die.
You, come here.
Take these cuffs. Cuff this man.
translation.it: Prendi le mie manette e ammanettalo.

translation.en: Or I put three in his chest right now, lessen the trouble.
translation.it: O gli ficco tre pallottole nel petto e faccio prima.

translation.en: Go on.
Tell this young buck to back up.
translation.it: Di' al giovanotto di stare indietro.

translation.en: Easy, Jim.
Everybody in here know who I am.
I'm taking Nat Love to Fort Smith to be tried.
translation.it: Porto Nat Love a Fort Smith per essere processato.

translation.en: Anybody try to follow me, y'all know what I do.
translation.it: Provate a seguirmi e sapete cosa farò.

translation.en: Come on.
Y'all enjoy the rest of the evening.
Cherokee Bill, Ms. Smith, top of the morning to you both.
translation.it: Cherokee Bill, sig.na Smith, buona giornata a entrambi.

translation.en: Mr. Buck, glad to have you back in Redwood, sir.
translation.it: Sig. Buck, lieto di rivederla a Redwood.

translation.en: Any word on the take from the Kansas City bank?
translation.it: Niente sulla rapina alla banca di Kansas City?

translation.en: The Crimson Hoods took it for $25,000.
translation.it: I cappucci cremisi hanno preso 25.000 dollari.

translation.en: But they were ambushed before they got here.
translation.it: Ma sono stati derubati poco dopo.

translation.en: Everybody knows it's suicide to take from us.
translation.it: Tutti sanno che derubarci è un suicidio.

translation.en: Someone obviously disagrees.
translation.it: Qualcuno ovviamente non la pensa così.

translation.en: Goddamn it. That just put us right back where we started.
translation.it: Dannazione. Siamo al punto di partenza.

translation.en: How we supposed to build a Mecca without any bricks?
translation.it: Come si costruisce una fortezza senza mattoni?

translation.en: [Trudy] We gonna have to take it out of our own bank.
[man] We don't have that type of money, Trudy.
We only got a few pennies over $2,500.
What did he say?
-[man] 2,500-- -I heard you.
-[Trudy] Wiley. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah.
[Rufus] Sure is hot, ain't it?
What's up, little man?
-You wanna see something? -[boy] Yeah.
Watch this now. Don't take your eyes off it.
translation.it: Guardala e non distogliere lo sguardo.

translation.en: Oh, it's still there! [laughs]
Look at you.
Relic of yesteryear with nothin'.
translation.it: Un reperto del passato senza niente.

translation.en: And you think you can roll into my town and take what belong to me?
translation.it: E pensi di poter venire nella mia città a derubarmi?

translation.en: Who the fuck you think I am, huh?
translation.it: Per chi cazzo mi hai preso?

translation.en: Ain't nobody scared of you and ain't nobody runnin'.
translation.it: Qui nessuno ha paura di te e nessuno scappa.

translation.en: I'm a sinister motherfucker too.
One click of my finger and you disappear.
translation.it: Uno schiocco di dita e ti faccio sparire.

translation.en: So I suggest you leave…
before I finish my steak.
-And if you even think about sticking-- -[knocking on door]
translation.it: E se solo pensassi di restare…

translation.en: Come in.
What is it, Carson?
Sheriff, Mr. Buck wants to see you out front.
translation.it: Il sig. Buck l'aspetta qui fuori.

translation.en: Tell that man I ain't got nothing to say to him.
It wasn't a request.
[Rufus] You wanna sell this town while I rot in prison?
translation.it: Vuoi vendere la città mentre io marcisco in cella?

translation.en: The world you knew is gone.
translation.it: Il mondo di un tempo è finito.

translation.en: There's a flood comin'.
Do you think you can hold onto this place when it hit?
translation.it: Ti aggrapperai a questo posto quando colpirà?

translation.en: At least I know enough to get mine and get out.
translation.it: Io almeno so prendere ciò che è mio e sparire.

translation.en: Kill me…
and you'll have nothing.
You know, a man like you will have us all subservient
translation.it: Quelli come te vogliono solo asservirci

translation.en: till the end of our days
translation.it: fino alla fine dei nostri giorni,

translation.en: so's long as you can buy yourself a house,
a badge, and them goddamn gold teeth.
translation.it: un distintivo e un dannato dente d'oro.

translation.en: You want to do this here?
[Wiley] There you go. That's what you want, right?
translation.it: Ecco. È quello che volevi, no?

translation.en: That's what you came here for?
I won't disappoint you. Come on.
That's what you want. Want some more?
translation.it: È quello che vuoi. Ne vuoi ancora?

translation.en: You want some more, right? You want some more?
translation.it: È quello che vuoi, no? Ne vuoi ancora?

translation.en: [Rufus] Come here, motherfucker.
Here you go.
Oh shit. I done hit gold.
Hey, boy. Come here. Come, get that gold. Get that gold.
translation.it: Ragazzo, vieni qui. Raccogli l'oro, su.

translation.en: All right. Tell your mama you rich now! Go ahead!
translation.it: Bene. Di' alla mamma che ora sei ricco! Vai!

translation.en: [Rufus] Now, I ain't gonna kill you, Wiley.
[echoing] You and I were friends once.
But know this. Redwood will never be yours, never.
translation.it: Ma sappi che Redwood non sarà mai tua.

translation.en: Never.
Matter of fact, you ain't welcome here no more.
translation.it: Anzi, qui non sei più il benvenuto.

translation.en: Now…
I want you to vacate immediately or die where you lay.
translation.it: Voglio che sloggi all'istante. O ti ammazzo qui e ora.

translation.en: Say what?
That's right.
You coulda taken these off a while back. Yep.
Tell me something. How you know Rufus will be in Redwood?
translation.it: Dimmi una cosa. Come sai che Rufus è a Redwood?

translation.en: [Nat] He's taking that money from them Crimson Hoods.
translation.it: Aspetta i soldi dai cappucci cremisi.

translation.en: That's where he'll be.
Now you teaming up with a marshal to bring him in.
translation.it: Ora ti allei con un marshal per arrestarlo.

translation.en: I ain't bringing him in. I'm bringing him down.
And we ain't teaming up, old man.
Your life's expendable, Marshal. My gang's ain't.
translation.it: Lei è sacrificabile. La mia banda no.

translation.en: Shit, since we're out here, I oughta tell you…
I was fixin' to kill you…
when you and your fellas brought in Rufus.
A lot of men be fixin', son.
They always seem to die before they get the job done.
translation.it: Ma muoiono sempre prima di riuscirci.

translation.en: Just for the record…
I took Rufus in alone.
[Nat] Mary.
I figured you'd be halfway to Fort Smith by now.
translation.it: Credevo fossi a metà strada verso Fort Smith.

translation.en: You can put that gun down, Marshal. This ain't a ambush.
translation.it: Metta giù l'arma, marshal. Non è un'imboscata.

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might wanna keep yours handy.
translation.it: A te, invece, farebbe comodo averne una.

translation.en: Do you think I'm stupid enough to fall for that bullshit y'all pulled in my saloon?
translation.it: Credevi davvero che avessi abboccato alla vostra scenetta nel saloon?

translation.en: I don't want you mixed up in this no more.
Then you shoulda told me so.
I must confess to some raw feelings myself.
This ain't no road to ask a friend to travel.
translation.it: Non metto in pericolo gli amici.

translation.en: Now you take that money we took off them Crimson Hoods and you buy that ranch you always blabbing about. Hmm?
translation.it: Prendi i soldi rubati ai cappucci cremisi e comprati il ranch di cui parlavi sempre.

translation.en: That's mighty generous of you, but that ain't how this gang work.
translation.it: Sei molto generoso, ma la banda non funziona così.

translation.en: Take stays in the usual place, ready to be shared three ways when we come back.
translation.it: Il bottino è al suo posto. Lo divideremo in tre quando torniamo.

translation.en: Ain't no coming back from this.
Now get out of here.
All of you. This ain't your fight.
You take on the Devil himself, you gonna need more than you and the marshal.
translation.it: Contro il diavolo in persona, voi due non bastate.

translation.en: I seen the Devil, and Rufus Buck ain't him.
translation.it: Ho visto il diavolo e non è Rufus Buck.

translation.en: Devil's white.
You got a reason you wanna die, Jim?
translation.it: Hai un motivo per morire, Jim?

translation.en: Outside of you saving me from this?
translation.it: A parte che mi hai salvato da questa?

translation.en: Besides, Monroe said Cherokee Bill run with Rufus.
translation.it: E poi Monroe dice che Cherokee Bill sta con Rufus.

translation.en: Every time I speak on my speed,
a motherfucker wanna pull Cherokee Bill out they ass.
translation.it: qualche stronzo tira fuori Cherokee Bill.

translation.en: I'ma put a end to that argument once and for all.
Like they say in the Book of Clarence, "No man out-speed me."
translation.it: Il Libro di Clarence recita: "Nessuno è più lasto di me".

translation.en: Out-speed ain't a word, and Clarence ain't no book.
I'm hopin' Cherokee put a bullet in your ass just to shut you up.
translation.it: Spero che Cherokee ti spari nel culo per zittirti.

translation.en: -Hey. -You left these on my wall, Mr. Love.
Figured we going after villains, you'll need 'em.
Obliged.
What y'all waiting around for?
You think destiny is comin' to you?
translation.it: Che il destino venga da voi?

translation.en: Hyup! Go!
-Yeah. I know. -[horse whinnies]
Go ahead.
♪ Wahala they go Wahala they come ♪
[Rufus] How do I look?
[Trudy] All right.
Everybody out there?
Just about.
How could you do it?
Leave all of this to Wiley?
If you were runnin' Redwood,
who woulda kept the operation goin'?
Who else woulda kept all them gangs in line?
translation.it: Chi avrebbe tenuto in riga quelle bande?

translation.en: Look, I know that Wiley got his ways, but he was loyal once.
translation.it: So che Wiley vuol fare a modo suo, ma un tempo era una persona leale.

translation.en: Loyalty is a virtue, Rufus.
translation.it: La lealtà è una virtù, Rufus.

translation.en: Till it ain't.
You loyal to me?
See these folk here?
Either they can't see it or they don't want to.
translation.it: O non possono o non vogliono vederlo.

translation.en: But I believe in what you're doing.
translation.it: Ma io credo in quello che fai.

translation.en: This place can be the promised land for us.
translation.it: Questo posto può essere la nostra terra promessa.

translation.en: And as long as that so, ain't nothing I won't do to see it through.
translation.it: Finché resta così, farò di tutto per andare fino in fondo.

translation.en: You tell them.
[Trudy] Citizens of Redwood.
A new day is dawning.
translation.it: Oggi è l'alba di un nuovo giorno.

translation.en: As by now you have doubtless learned,
the territory will officially open up for settlement.
translation.it: che questo territorio verrà venduto ai coloni.

translation.en: Now they say everything we own is gonna stay our own.
translation.it: Ci dicono che ciò che è nostro resterà nostro.

translation.en: But you know as well as I do how much that's worth.
translation.it: Ma sapete anche voi quanto vale la loro parola.

translation.en: See, your land, your businesses, your homes
translation.it: La vostra terra, i vostri affari e le vostre case

translation.en: has all been promised to the highest bidders
translation.it: sono stati promessi al miglior offerente

translation.en: by your one-time sheriff, Wiley Escoe.
translation.it: dal vostro ex sceriffo Wiley Escoe.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Buck can prevent this from happening.
translation.it: Il sig. Buck può evitare tutto questo.

translation.en: But in order for us to do that, it's necessary that we levy a tax.
translation.it: Ma, per farlo, dobbiamo imporre una tassa.

translation.en: -[crowd muttering] -At what cost to us?
You could scrape every penny from every living soul in this town,
translation.it: Frugate nelle tasche di ogni anima della città

translation.en: and it wouldn't come near to that.
translation.it: e non ci arriverete neanche vicini.

translation.en: You got us between a rock and a hard place.
translation.it: Siamo tra l'incudine e il martello.

translation.en: How long you been alive in this country?
translation.it: Da quanto vive in questo Paese?

translation.en: A rock and a hard place is what we call Monday.
translation.it: Essere tra l'incudine e il martello è il nostro pane quotidiano.

translation.en: I've heard of Rufus Buck.
translation.it: Ho sentito parlare di Rufus Buck.

translation.en: How bad a man he is.
But he got himself thrown in jail once before,
translation.it: È finito al fresco già una volta

translation.en: and I reckon he'll be back there again soon enough.
translation.it: e credo che ci tornerà presto.

translation.en: When he is, maybe I'll come back to this town.
translation.it: E, quando succederà, allora forse tornerò in questa città.

translation.en: 'Cause I ain't paying shit.
You think I made Redwood for myself?
translation.it: Credi che abbia fondato Redwood per me?

translation.en: To what end?
Redwood ain't a hiding place, 'cause I don't hide.
translation.it: Redwood non è un nascondiglio. Io non mi nascondo.

translation.en: It ain't a dream. I don't dream.
translation.it: Non è un sogno. Io non sogno.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It's an example.
It's an example…
for others to follow.
And you…
you are an enemy of progress.
translation.it: Tu sei un nemico del progresso.

translation.en: Please. Please.
-I got a family. -What's your name?
[Rufus] Rest in peace, James.
Now, how much?
How much can be gathered?
Ten thousand.
Maybe 15, if every last cent can be squeezed.
Ain't nobody leave town until we collect it all.
translation.it: Nessuno lasci la città finché non li racimoliamo.

translation.en: And if you fail to comply,
you and everything you love will burn.
translation.it: brucerà insieme a tutto ciò che ama.

translation.en: I ain't got nothin' to rob.
But I got somebody to shoot. Step down.
translation.it: Ma io ho qualcuno a cui sparare. Scendi.

translation.en: Wiley Escoe. Bass Reeves.
Fuck.
Redwood crawling with gunmen.
Rufus came with 12 and took six of mine.
translation.it: Rufus ne aveva già 12 e ha preso sei dei miei.

translation.en: Who knows how many he got by now.
I don't believe a thing this man sayin'.
translation.it: Non credo a una parola di quello che dice.

translation.en: He a scout. I say we kill him.
translation.it: È in ricognizione. Io dico di ucciderlo.

translation.en: And we take the rest of them teeth.
translation.it: E ci teniamo i denti rimasti.

translation.en: You ever shot a sheriff, boy? A mayor?
translation.it: Hai mai ammazzato uno sceriffo, ragazzo? Un sindaco?

translation.en: Little harder than shootin' regular folk. And I'm both.
translation.it: Non è come uccidere uno qualunque. E io sono entrambe le cose.

translation.en: [Bass] You both alive and dead 'cause Rufus don't like loose ends.
translation.it: Tu sei un morto che cammina. Rufus non ama i conti in sospeso.

translation.en: Law don't find a man like Rufus Buck unless you got inside information.
translation.it: Non arresti Rufus Buck senza informazioni dall'interno.

translation.en: Ain't that right, Wiley?
If I had my way, you'd be right up under the jail next to Rufus.
translation.it: Se fosse per me, ora saresti in galera con Rufus.

translation.en: But you cut yourself a deal, wound up wearing a badge instead.
translation.it: Ma ti sei accordato e hai ottenuto un distintivo.

translation.en: You got your reasons you want Rufus gone, and I got mine.
translation.it: Tu hai le tue ragioni per eliminare Rufus e io ho le mie.

translation.en: Ain't the enemy of my enemy my friend?
translation.it: I nemici dei nemici sono amici, no?

translation.en: Rufus tryin' to save Redwood. But for that, he need money.
translation.it: Rufus vuole salvare Redwood. Ma gli servono soldi.

translation.en: And that's one thing he ain't have.
translation.it: Ed è proprio ciò che non ha.

translation.en: All right, look here. You made a deal with the Devil.
translation.it: Senti, tu hai fatto un patto col diavolo.

translation.en: Now he come to collect.
You rest up, but be gone before sunup.
Or it's gonna go from bad to badder. You hear?
translation.it: O passerai dalla padella alla brace. Hai capito?

translation.en: Marshal. Marshal. Marshal.
All them tricks'll get you killed, son.
translation.it: Con quei giochetti ti farai ammazzare.

translation.en: [Jim] Listen, Marshal.
I'm faster than any weapon. You can trust in that.
translation.it: Sono più rapido di qualsiasi arma. Puoi starne certo.

translation.en: I seen faster.
All right. Where?
In the mirror.
Negro said, "In the mirror." [Jim] I'm so… I'm sorry.
I rather ride into a gun battle on a dark horse over a golden stallion.
translation.it: Preferisco non arrivare da vincitore annunciato.

translation.en: -Fuck that mean? -Shiny shit get shot.
translation.it: - Che cazzo significa? - Fatti notare e finisci male.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
What you think about that, lawman?
translation.it: Tu che ne dici, uomo di legge?

translation.en: I think y'all gonna die.
[Nat singing] ♪ And away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
♪ As her garden grows ♪
♪ Hold those flowers close ♪
♪ For away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
I'll be back with information by sunup.
translation.it: Entro l'alba torno con le informazioni.

translation.en: Information from where?
You know we can't trust Wiley's word.
translation.it: Non possiamo fidarci di Wiley, lo sai.

translation.en: Someone's got to get the lay of the land before we make our next move.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare a verificare prima di fare la prossima mossa.

translation.en: Yeah, Mary, but that somebody ain't got to be you.
translation.it: Non significa che debba andarci tu.

translation.en: Every gunhand in the territory's gonna recognize you the second you hop off your horse.
translation.it: Ogni pistolero ti riconoscerebbe non appena sceso da cavallo.

translation.en: Same with Bill and Beckwourth.
In case you forgot,
your face more famous than all of ours put together, Stagecoach Mary.
translation.it: tu sei più riconoscibile di tutti noi messi insieme.

translation.en: Got it up on advertisements for that saloon of yours from here to Texas.
translation.it: Sei su tutte le locandine del tuo saloon da qui al Texas.

translation.en: Which is why I can ride into town in plain sight.
translation.it: Per questo posso andare in città a volto scoperto.

translation.en: Everybody knows I'm buying saloons.
translation.it: Tutti sanno che compro saloon. Rufus ha bisogno di soldi.

translation.en: Rufus need money. I'ma make him an offer on Trudy Smith's place--
translation.it: Tutti sanno che compro saloon. Rufus ha bisogno di soldi. Gli farò un'offerta per quello di Trudy…

translation.en: Mary, what in my character makes you think I'll allow that?
translation.it: Gli farò un'offerta per quello di Trudy… E credi che te lo lascerò fare?

translation.en: I'm not asking for your permission.
translation.it: Non ti sto chiedendo il permesso.

translation.en: All right.
Then I… I guess I'll just be asking you for yours.
translation.it: Allora chiederò io il permesso a te.

translation.en: Since you'll never let a man give you away,
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno a cui chiederlo,

translation.en: I just have to ask you direct.
translation.it: quindi devo chiederlo direttamente a te.

translation.en: That's the ring my father gave my mother.
translation.it: È l'anello che mio padre regalò a mia madre.

translation.en: I was gonna give it to you back in Douglas.
translation.it: Volevo dartelo quando eravamo a Douglas.

translation.en: But you didn't.
I am now.
I used to hate feeling helpless over you.
translation.it: Un tempo odiavo sentirmi indifesa davanti a te.

translation.en: Those days are over now.
When the dust settles, we gonna go our separate ways, for good.
translation.it: Quando si calmeranno le acque, ci diremo addio per sempre.

translation.en: But not till the dust settles. I'm here till then.
translation.it: Ma non prima. Fino ad allora, sono qui.

translation.en: See you sunup.
Are you a resident of Redwood, ma'am?
You don't own a gun confident enough to ask where I reside.
translation.it: Neanche un buon revolver mi farebbe dire dove risiedo.

translation.en: Well, this gun say answer the damn question.
translation.it: Beh, questo revolver dice di rispondere alla domanda.

translation.en: Well, this gun don't talk.
[Trudy] Stagecoach Mary.
Ghastly Gertrude Smith.
I prefer Treacherous Trudy myself, but I'll take it.
translation.it: Preferisco Trudy l'insidiosa, ma va bene lo stesso.

translation.en: What brings you to my town?
translation.it: Cosa ti porta nella mia città?

translation.en: I heard Rufus Buck was back.
translation.it: So che Rufus Buck è tornato.

translation.en: -News travels fast. -[man chuckles]
I have an offer he might wanna hear about.
Well, any offer you got, you can make it to me.
I don't do business with the help.
Give me that shit.
Lead the way, Treacherous Trudy.
Speak your piece.
translation.it: Di' ciò che hai da dire.

translation.en: I assume you know who I am.
translation.it: Credo che tu sappia chi sono.

translation.en: I assume you know who I used to run with.
translation.it: Credo che tu sappia con chi stavo.

translation.en: Those days are over for me anyhow,
but I didn't get to be Stagecoach Mary Fields
translation.it: ma non sarei diventata Mary Fields

translation.en: without having my ears to the ground
translation.it: se non avessi tenuto le orecchie aperte.

translation.en: and my ears tell me you just lost 25 thou that was coming your way.
translation.it: E ho sentito che hai perso i 25.000 che dovevano arrivarti.

translation.en: [Trudy] I hope your proposal rivals your nerve--
translation.it: Spero che la tua offerta sia spavalda come…

translation.en: Allow me the latitude of completion.
My saloon in Douglas is boomin'.
translation.it: Il mio saloon di Douglas va alla grande.

translation.en: Bought me another one in the Elks, and I got a restaurant in Cascade too.
translation.it: Ne ho uno sulle Elk e un ristorante sulla Catena delle Cascate.

translation.en: For the sum of all that, I could take this one off your hands.
The mere mention of my name brings forth good business
translation.it: Il mio nome è sinonimo di ottimi affari

translation.en: to any establishment attached, whereas,
with all due respect, but the name Rufus Buck instils fear.
translation.it: col dovuto rispetto, il tuo incute paura.

translation.en: We know who you are.
You walkin' into my town with that proposal is risky.
translation.it: Venire fin qui con una tale offerta è un bel rischio.

translation.en: The kind of risk a woman such as yourself wouldn't tie herself to
unless there was a whole lot more at stake.
translation.it: se la posta in gioco non fosse ben più alta.

translation.en: See, I don't believe in coincidence,
translation.it: Vedi, io non credo alle coincidenze.

translation.en: like you just gonna walk in here
translation.it: Ti presenti qui appena dopo che ai cappucci cremisi

translation.en: right after the Crimson Hoods get ambushed with my money.
translation.it: Ti presenti qui appena dopo che ai cappucci cremisi hanno rubato i miei soldi.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
You must have forgot whose name is on the door.
translation.it: Devi aver dimenticato il nome sull'insegna.

translation.en: Another round.
We havin' a party, y'all. Come on.
[Nat] All right, Mary.
All right.
So you still sayin' you don't know nothin' about that money
translation.it: Sei sempre convinta di non sapere niente dei soldi

translation.en: and you done come here alone?
translation.it: e di essere qui da sola?

translation.en: That's right.
You done rode all the way over here to get yourself killed.
translation.it: Sei venuta fin qui per farti ammazzare.

translation.en: And for what?
For love?
Love is the only thing worth dying for.
translation.it: È l'unica cosa per cui valga la pena morire.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that.
You know, I had a sister named Mary.
translation.it: Sai, avevo una sorella di nome Mary.

translation.en: She was pretty, strong-willed, like you.
She died of polio when I was 11.
translation.it: Morì di polio che avevo 11 anni.

translation.en: Always was in pain, but she'd never let me see her cry.
translation.it: Soffriva di continuo, ma davanti a me non piangeva mai.

translation.en: There's this girl called Hope lived by us.
translation.it: E c'era una ragazza, una certa Hope. Una vicina di casa.

translation.en: Big fat kid, always picking on the smaller kids.
translation.it: Una cicciona che bullizzava le ragazzine più piccole.

translation.en: Obviously out of jealousy.
But she ain't never fuck with me though.
translation.it: Ma a me non rompeva il cazzo.

translation.en: She hated Mary with a passion,
always teasing her about how thin and frail she was.
translation.it: la prendeva sempre in giro per la sua magrezza e la sua fragilità.

translation.en: Then one day, Hope walkin' by our house,
translation.it: Poi, un giorno, Hope passò davanti a casa nostra,

translation.en: apple in one hand, blade in the other.
translation.it: con una mela in una mano e un coltello nell'altra.

translation.en: She decided to throw the apple across the street at Mary,
translation.it: Da lontano lanciò la mela verso Mary

translation.en: and it hit my sister in the head and knocked her out of balance.
translation.it: colpendola in testa e facendole perdere l'equilibrio.

translation.en: She fell down the steps.
Broke her ankle.
And now that…
that was the first and only time I physically seen my sister cry.
translation.it: fu la prima e unica volta che vidi piangere mia sorella.

translation.en: And there was Hope standing there laughin' her ugly fuckin' face off.
translation.it: Mentre quella merda di Hope se la rideva alla grande.

translation.en: My daddy…
he got home,
he took off his belt, and he beat me for not protecting my sister.
translation.it: si tolse la cintola e picchiò me per non aver protetto mia sorella.

translation.en: He lashed me until my whole body went numb.
translation.it: Mi frustò finché non sentii più nulla.

translation.en: Then
he went to Hope house to do the same thing to her.
translation.it: andò a casa di Hope per farle la stessa cosa.

translation.en: When he got there, he saw her whole family standin' on the side of the house,
translation.it: Quando arrivò lì, i familiari di Hope erano fuori in piedi

translation.en: all of 'em screamin' and cryin',
and there was Hope…
lyin' on the floor in a pool of blood.
translation.it: sul pavimento in un lago di sangue.

translation.en: Somebody had slit her throat. Killed her with her own knife.
translation.it: Qualcuno le aveva tagliato la gola, uccidendola col suo stesso coltello.

translation.en: Daddy was speechless.
He ain't said a word to me when he came home.
translation.it: Non mi disse una parola, una volta a casa.

translation.en: The next day, he sent me to live with my grandparents.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo mi mandò a vivere dai nonni.

translation.en: And then the next time I seen my sister,
she was laying in a coffin.
Disease had killed her.
I'm sorry your sister had to suffer.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che tua sorella abbia sofferto.

translation.en: I admire her bravery.
But you get no words from me.
You know, I actually admire your bravery.
translation.it: Sai, io ammiro il tuo, di coraggio.

translation.en: But I'm afraid the outcome is still the outcome.
translation.it: Ma temo che il risultato non cambierà.

translation.en: Hope must die.
But not yet.
Leave her out here in the street so everybody can see her.
No one come to collect her 'fore sunup, put a bullet in her head.
translation.it: Se non la reclamano prima dell'alba, uccidila.

translation.en: [man] Yes, ma'am.
Looks like we don't have to wait that long.
Whoever die first, right?
-Whoever die first. -[Jim] Mmm-hmm.
Get her up.
"Whoever die first"?
Now, what kind of dumbass saying is that?
You two trying to get shot out here?
Nat Love. How predictable.
You predict my friend Bill Pickett aiming at your bowler cap?
translation.it: Sai anche predire che Bill Pickett mirerà alla tua bombetta?

translation.en: You'll be dead before your boys get their aim.
translation.it: Sarai morta prima che i tuoi prendano la mira.

translation.en: And you die right after.
But your boss won't see one red cent of that money.
translation.it: Ma il tuo capo non vedrebbe un centesimo.

translation.en: My boss?
Where is he?
Where is who?
[Nat] Marshal.
I'm speakin' English, yeah?
-Sound like English to me. -[Nat] Mmm-hmm.
Where's Rufus Buck?
[Bass] Trudy.
If I'd known you were switchin' sides, I'da asked you to come join us.
translation.it: Se avessi saputo che cambiavi fronte, ti avrei assoldato io.

translation.en: You here for your damsel in distress?
translation.it: Sei qui per salvare la fanciulla?

translation.en: You don't look hard of hearing.
So I'ma ask you again.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Well, clearly, you don't know me.
translation.it: Beh, è ovvio che non mi conosci.

translation.en: Tell your men to go, but you stay,
translation.it: Manda via i tuoi amici. Tu resta,

translation.en: and maybe your damsel will live a little longer.
translation.it: e forse la tua fanciulla vivrà ancora per un po'.

translation.en: You're pretty though.
-Ah, take her ass back in there. -Yes, ma'am.
Gonna get me a drink.
[Jim] Hey.
That the quick draw I hear tell about, Cherokee Bill?
I hear you so fast that your opponents ain't got time to draw
translation.it: I tuoi rivali non fanno in tempo a estrarre la pistola

translation.en: before you put two in they back.
No, that ain't me.
I'm the Cherokee Bill that shoots men in the mouth that talk too much.
translation.it: Sono il Cherokee Bill che spara a chi ha la lingua lunga.

translation.en: I'll make it easy for you, then.
You draw first.
That what you think this is? "Who the quickest draw in the West?"
translation.it: Credi si tratti di questo? Della pistola più veloce del West?

translation.en: All comes down to who fast and who ain't, right?
translation.it: Conta solo chi è più rapido, no?

translation.en: No, it all comes down to who's alive and who's dead.
translation.it: No, conta solo chi vive e chi muore.

translation.en: Trudy, I'm gonna get me something to drink.
translation.it: Trudy, io mi faccio un drink.

translation.en: Good night.
Hey, hey, drink, my ass, man.
-I practiced that standoff all night. -Jim.
translation.it: - Provo questo stallo da giorni. - Jim.

translation.en: -[Jim] You're not about to walk away. -[Nat] Get out of here.
translation.it: E non te ne andrai… Un po' di rispetto.

translation.en: -No, nobody-- -[Nat] Get out of here, Jim.
-[Jim] That chicken-- -[Bass] It ain't the time.
Okay. Okay.
[man] March, boy.
-I said march! -March.
Hup, two, three, four.
That's enough.
They beat you bad?
I'ma kill 'em all.
[Rufus] You familiar with Napoleon?
He said, "I am driven towards an end that I do not know."
translation.it: Disse: "Sono spinto verso una meta che non conosco.

translation.en: "As I reach it, as I shall become unnecessary,
an atom shall suffice to shatter me."
"Until then, all forces of humankind can do nothing to stop me."
translation.it: Fino ad allora, nessuna forza umana potrà fermarmi".

translation.en: That's a man who knew exactly who he was.
translation.it: Come uomo, sapeva bene chi era.

translation.en: Most importantly, he knew that his time would come to an end.
translation.it: Soprattutto, sapeva che un giorno sarebbe arrivata la fine.

translation.en: Cut him down.
You know why…
I gave you that scar?
[Nat] So I'd remember you.
[Rufus] No.
No, I gave you that scar so I can know your face when you come back to me.
translation.it: No, per riconoscerti quando ti avessi rivisto.

translation.en: the outlaw who robs outlaws,
translation.it: il fuorilegge che deruba i fuorilegge,

translation.en: the angel of death who hunts down those who trespass against him with no mercy.
translation.it: l'angelo della morte che dà la caccia a chi lo offende, senza pietà.

translation.en: I know who you are.
And I see the line that you won't cross.
translation.it: E vedo il confine che non attraverserai.

translation.en: See, I know what's on the other side.
translation.it: Io so cosa c'è dall'altra parte.

translation.en: Apologize for the beating.
It was more of an indication for what Ms. Fields might see
translation.it: Erano più un monito per la sig.na Fields,

translation.en: if we fail to come to terms.
translation.it: nel caso non raggiungessimo un accordo.

translation.en: [Nat] What terms?
You will return the money you stole from me by Friday noon.
translation.it: Restituirai i soldi che mi hai rubato entro venerdì a mezzogiorno.

translation.en: Not a moment later.
And you will add $10,000 on top of that. We'll call that interest.
translation.it: Insieme ad altri 10.000 dollari. Una sorta di interesse.

translation.en: Somethin' funny?
Ooh, shit, how… how you reckon I'ma get that?
translation.it: E come cazzo credi che li troverò?

translation.en: You're gonna rob a bank.
Nat Love is gonna rob a bank.
In the meantime, here's a little token of my appreciation in advance.
translation.it: Nel frattempo, un piccolo segno della mia riconoscenza.

translation.en: Go ahead, open it.
I expect my money on Friday.
All of it.
[Bass] You know I can't let you do that.
translation.it: Sai che non te lo lascerò fare.

translation.en: If that money ain't in Rufus' hands in three days, Mary'll die.
translation.it: Se Rufus non avrà i soldi entro tre giorni, Mary morirà.

translation.en: [Pickett] What bank we talking about anyway? [Nat] Maysville.
translation.it: - E quale banca dovremmo rapinare? - Maysville.

translation.en: That's a white town.
Yeah, which is why they gonna have $10,000 in their bank.
translation.it: Sì, per questo in banca ci saranno i 10.000.

translation.en: It's crazy.
[Jim] My emotions are all types of confused.
I mean, Pickett, I agree. That's crazy.
translation.it: Cioè, concordo con te, Pickett. È assurdo.

translation.en: But, Nat, I also agree with you telling the marshal that we gonna do that shit anyways.
translation.it: Ma anche con Nat quando dice al marshal che lo faremo comunque.

translation.en: That's some true outlaw shit.
-We outlaws, ain't we? -[Nat] Ain't no "we," Jim.
Not after that shit you pulled in town nearly got us all killed.
translation.it: In città per poco non ci facevi ammazzare.

translation.en: I had that.
[Nat] Fetch that money you took from the Crimson Hoods.
translation.it: Recupera i soldi rubati ai cappucci cremisi.

translation.en: Pickett, kid, you comin' with me.
If Rufus Buck want that bank took, why don't he send his own men?
translation.it: Perché Buck non ci manda i suoi in quella banca?

translation.en: This way he clean, see?
I gotta go in barefaced as day,
translation.it: Io dovrò andarci a volto scoperto,

translation.en: a freshly minted bank robber, face up on wanted posters all over the territory.
translation.it: un rapinatore nuovo di zecca che diventerà ricercato ovunque.

translation.en: They'll be on you like flies on shit before you open the door.
translation.it: Ti saranno addosso prima di varcare l'ingresso.

translation.en: Yep.
I said I had to be recognized.
translation.it: Ho detto che io dovrò essere riconosciuto.

translation.en: Go ahead.
[Cuffee] Hell no.
For Mary.
Close shave.
Close fucking shave!
I thought I was falling for a fella for a little bit. That's why I didn't say nothing.
translation.it: Temevo di essere attratto da un ragazzo. E sono stato zitto.

translation.en: Well, I ain't the only one. I can't…
translation.it: Beh, non sono l'unico. Non posso…

translation.en: I can't… It wasn't just me. It wasn't just me.
It was just you, Jim.
[Cuffee] Giddup now.
-[Nat] Allow me. -[grunts]
What's your real name?
Cuffee my real name.
Name I was born with? Cathay Williams.
translation.it: Il mio nome alla nascita? Cathay Williams.

translation.en: You walk worse than you ride, Cathay.
translation.it: Sei più brava a cavalcare che a camminare.

translation.en: Mr. Love, my momma always told me to respect my elders,
translation.it: Mia mamma mi ha insegnato a rispettare gli anziani.

translation.en: so I'm not gonna say what I'm thinking.
That's all right. I can read your mind. Then I'm sorry you had to hear that.
translation.it: - Non importa. Ti leggo nel pensiero. - Allora scusami a nome suo.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Go ahead, honey.
[teller] Yes?
I'd like to make a withdrawal.
What…
You have to have an account, ma'am.
And, well, I'd recommend a bank in Jericho or maybe Redwood for that.
translation.it: E le suggerirei di aprirlo a Jericho o a Redwood.

translation.en: I'm not talking about that kinda withdrawal.
translation.it: Non parlo di quel tipo di prelievo.

translation.en: I'm talk--
I'm talking about…
talking about that kind.
Hey, blue eyes.
You scared.
Your hand is shaking. You'll miss.
translation.it: Ti trema la mano. Sbaglierai il colpo.

translation.en: I won't.
Exhale.
Attaboy.
I ain't like my partner.
He don't wanna shoot nobody, but all of a sudden, I'm of a mind to.
translation.it: Lui non vuole ammazzare nessuno, ma di colpo a me ne è venuta voglia.

translation.en: Now open the fuckin' gate.
Think I'm funny now?
What you lookin' at?
Get all the customers over there.
-Get 'em over there! -Okay, okay.
-Everyone, please, this way quickly. -You too. Move!
translation.it: - Tutti di qua, presto. - Anche tu. Muoviti!

translation.en: Times have changed, ain't they?
They say robbing banks is hard work.
translation.it: Dicono che rapinare le banche sia faticoso.

translation.en: That's a lie. Robbing banks is easy.
The hard part is doing it without killing.
translation.it: Il difficile è farlo senza ammazzare nessuno.

translation.en: So, what'll it be…
Mr. Manager?
Good man.
[Cuffee] Come on. Let's go.
Come on. Giddyap. Go.
-Pleasure banking with you. -Okay, sir.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere. - Ok, signore.

translation.en: Don't even look like much.
Ain't what it look like. It's what it can buy you.
translation.it: Non conta quanti sembrano, ma cosa ci puoi comprare.

translation.en: Rufus won't let Mary go once he gets that money.
translation.it: Rufus non lascerà andare Mary comunque.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it.
He'll kill her, let me go, so's I carry that hurt with me.
translation.it: La ammazzerà e risparmierà me per farmi vivere nel rimorso.

translation.en: So what, we just went through all that trouble for nothin'?
translation.it: Quindi ci siamo disturbati per niente?

translation.en: Now we got something he want.
And that's it?
Gonna have to be.
You can be all hasty and shoot me now if you want,
translation.it: Potete affrettarvi a uccidermi, se volete,

translation.en: or you can wait to see what I brought with me first.
translation.it: oppure aspettate di vedere cosa ho portato con me.

translation.en: [Wiley] Rufus got stashes like this all across these hills.
translation.it: Rufus ha disseminato le colline di scorte come questa.

translation.en: Enough for a small army.
Don't nobody take what I got coming to me.
translation.it: Nessuno deve prendersi la mia parte.

translation.en: Not even the Devil himself.
[Bass] Rufus Buck is a man.
Y'all best reconcile yourselves with that fact.
Man or devil, this gonna be Buck's last day amongst the living.
translation.it: Uomo o diavolo, sarà il suo ultimo giorno tra i vivi.

translation.en: ♪ Upon my return ♪ ♪ See a changed soul ♪
translation.it: Al mio ritorno, sono un uomo nuovo

translation.en: -♪ That road was far ♪ -♪ That road was far ♪
-♪ And way too long ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ And way too long ♪
translation.it: - Ogni notte e giorno - Ogni notte e giorno

translation.en: -♪ They'll run from me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ They'll run from me ♪
translation.it: - Li farò fuggire - Li farò fuggire

translation.en: -♪ As they ran from you ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ As they ran from you ♪
translation.it: - Come hai fatto tu - Come hai fatto tu

translation.en: -♪ That fear in me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ That fear in me ♪
translation.it: - La mia paura - La mia paura

translation.en: ♪ Is in a distant view ♪
♪ Is ♪
♪ In a distant ♪
♪ View ♪
Afternoon.
I would ask you to run go fetch your superior,
translation.it: Ti chiederei di chiamare il tuo superiore,

translation.en: but that'd be like asking you to run go fetch your daddy.
translation.it: ma sarebbe come chiederti di chiamare tuo padre.

translation.en: It could be anybody, right?
You know,
I'm willing to bet my right arm
I've got a higher body count than yours.
translation.it: che ne ho ammazzati più di te.

translation.en: That'd be a bad bet, son.
I fancy that song or whatever it was you was whistling there.
translation.it: Mi piace quella canzone, o qualunque cosa stessi fischiettando.

translation.en: [Bass] Go, Jerry. Go.
That our money?
Walk with me.
Hey, just… just walk with me.
-Keep an eye on this, Angel. -[Angel] Mmm-hmm.
You know they call your boss the Devil hisself?
translation.it: Sai che chiamano il tuo capo "il diavolo"?

translation.en: Even the Devil needed money, right?
translation.it: Anche al diavolo servivano i soldi, no?

translation.en: So being as how we are in possession of that money…
translation.it: Allora, visto che abbiamo noi quei soldi,

translation.en: let me dictate the terms of engagement.
What the fuck was that? What the fuck was that, old man?
translation.it: Che cazzo significa? Che cazzo succede, vecchio?

translation.en: Is that the right arm or the left?
Oh man.
Well, now there's us…
and there's y'all.
You get a hold of your feisty buddy here.
You got a little rowdy rascal.
-Mary. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah, we'll get to that.
-We gonna count this first. -Now, Cherokee.
Or your boss gonna be one quick draw and $35,000 short.
translation.it: O il tuo capo si ritroverà senza un rapido pistolero e senza soldi.

translation.en: All right.
Unhitch this horse so's Mary can ride out.
-You always move so slow? -[Cherokee Bill] You always talk so much?
translation.it: - Sei sempre così lento? - Parli sempre così tanto?

translation.en: [Nat] Really?
In the back?
What you think, Beckwourth?
Nah, he wouldn't do that
'cause then I would have to put a bullet in his cranium.
translation.it: se no poi dovrei ficcargli una pallottola nel cranio.

translation.en: And we'll never know who the fastest really is now, will we?
translation.it: E non sapremmo mai chi è il più veloce.

translation.en: [Cherokee Bill] I gotta hand it to you, boy.
You do know how to make a grand entrance.
translation.it: Sai come si fa un'entrata a effetto.

translation.en: Shit, I didn't even rehearse that one.
You know, quick draw, Nat Love is a dead man walking.
translation.it: Sai, mano lesta, Nat Love è un morto che cammina.

translation.en: But you don't have to be.
Why don't you get on your horse, get your shit, and go back to whatever it is you call home?
translation.it: Monta sul cavallo, prendi le tue cose e torna a qualunque luogo tu chiami casa.

translation.en: You know that's impossible.
Count down from five?
Five…
Four…
Three…
Why do they always have to count so slow?
Blow that bitch, Bill!
Kill her.
Push!
Trudy's mine.
Let's go.
[Cherokee Bill] Son of a bitch!
Exhale, motherfucker.
[Bass] Come on.
-Where'd they get you? -Shoulder. Get down!
translation.it: - Dove ti hanno colpito? - Spalla. Giù!

translation.en: Matches.
You wanna smoke now?
Matches, Bass.
Okay.
Jump, motherfuckers.
Fuck it.
I always knew it was you
who gave me up.
God knew my heart.
Goodbye, old friend.
Rufus, I didn't have a choice--
I told that kid. Them damn tricks…
translation.it: Gliel'avevo detto. Lui e i suoi giochetti.

translation.en: -Sorry, ladies. -[footsteps rapidly approaching]
-You all right, Cuffee? -Just need to reload.
You look hurt, Mr. Pickett.
Ain't nothing but a flesh wound. Maggie ain't ready for me today.
translation.it: È solo un graffio. Maggie non è ancora pronta per me.

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'll be damned.
[Cuffee] Pickett!
[Cherokee Bill] Now, why you got that look on your face?
No. No, no, no, brother, no, no, no.
Stop that. Don't do that.
You had a choice.
You always got a choice.
[speaking Cherokee] Being scared will only give you bad karma in the afterlife.
translation.it: La paura ti darà soltanto un cattivo karma nell'aldilà.

translation.en: He didn't even have a chance, you son of a bitch!
translation.it: Non gli hai neanche dato una chance, stronzo!

translation.en: You gonna shoot me in the back too? Or cheat the count?
translation.it: Colpirai alle spalle anche me, in barba al conto alla rovescia?

translation.en: Beckwourth was faster.
Look after my friend.
[Bass] Nat.
Don't miss.
Pick up your guns.
[Rufus] I know what it is now.
It's the eyes.
Pick 'em up, I said.
[Rufus] Your father,
he was a good man?
He was.
And my mother was a good woman before you cut 'em down.
translation.it: Come mia madre, prima che tu li ammazzassi.

translation.en: Seems we had a different upbringing.
translation.it: Siamo stati cresciuti in modo diverso, pare.

translation.en: I don't care how you was raised.
Now pick up your guns and turn around.
translation.it: Ora raccogli le tue pistole e voltati.

translation.en: I used to watch my father beat my mother to a pulp
translation.it: Guardavo mio padre picchiare a sangue mia madre

translation.en: if she overcooked his food.
translation.it: se lei gli scuoceva la cena.

translation.en: He cut her up real good if she undercooked it too.
translation.it: E la picchiava anche se la cuoceva troppo poco.

translation.en: One day, I decided to intervene,
and he turned his wrath on me.
translation.it: e lui se la prese con me.

translation.en: My father was not a good man.
translation.it: Mio padre non era un brav'uomo.

translation.en: Not a good man. He was an outlaw.
translation.it: Non un brav'uomo. Era un fuorilegge.

translation.en: Robbin' banks…
He liked to drink.
My mother took a bottle and cut him to protect me.
translation.it: Mia madre prese una bottiglia e lo ferì per difendermi.

translation.en: He lashed back at her, and just like that, she was gone.
translation.it: Lui si infuriò e, un attimo dopo, lei non c'era più.

translation.en: Then, like the coward he is,
he took everything we had and left,
translation.it: prese tutti i nostri averi e se ne andò,

translation.en: leaving me with my…
my mother.
I was ten years old, you know…
about the same age you was…
when I gave you that scar.
I had to fend for myself, but I became who I am,
translation.it: Mi sono dovuto arrangiare, ma sono diventato quello che sono,

translation.en: just like you.
As I did, all I could ever think about is wanting my father to pay for what he did.
translation.it: Ma io volevo solo che mio padre pagasse per ciò che aveva fatto.

translation.en: I searched for him for years and years, and I could never find him.
translation.it: Lo cercai per anni, senza mai trovarlo.

translation.en: It's like he disappeared off the face of the earth.
translation.it: Era come scomparso dalla faccia della Terra.

translation.en: I ain't stop though. I kept looking…
translation.it: Non mi arresi. Continuai a cercare…

translation.en: until I did find him.
One day…
lo and behold,
there he was, my father,
a new man.
He was clean now.
Sober.
Man of God.
Had a church.
He had a pretty little wife.
And he had a son,
about the age of ten years old,
whose eyes blazed like mine.
translation.it: i cui occhi brillavano come i miei.

translation.en: You're lyin'.
You're lyin'!
Killing our father was retribution, but--
translation.it: Uccidere nostro padre fu la mia vendetta…

translation.en: My father!
My mother!
But it weren't enough.
Letting you live,
that was the true revenge.
Every sin you made, every bank you robbed, everybody you killed.
translation.it: Ogni tuo peccato, ogni tua rapina, ogni tuo omicidio.

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
You everything he tried to run away from.
translation.it: Tu sei tutto ciò da cui lui voleva scappare.

translation.en: Changed his name to "Love."
You a Buck.
You lyin'.
Just like me.
Just like him.
But you better. You gonna surpass even me because…
translation.it: Ma tu sei migliore. Supererai perfino me perché…

translation.en: I couldn't kill my brother.
Yet here you are about to kill yours.
translation.it: Tu invece stai per uccidere tuo fratello.

translation.en: [sighs] It's time to take your revenge, Nathaniel Buck.
translation.it: È arrivata l'ora della vendetta, Nathaniel Buck.

translation.en: Go on.
-Nathaniel Buck. -No.
Take your revenge.
-[gunshot] -Take your goddamn revenge!
You a Buck.
-Nathaniel-- -[gunshot]
[Mary, softly] Is the Devil dead?
I don't know.
All right, fellas.
You sure the law gonna believe he's dead?
translation.it: Sicuro che la legge crederà alla sua morte?

translation.en: I'm the law, Ms. Mary.
If I say a man dead, he dead.
translation.it: Se dico che è morto, è morto.

translation.en: And you?
You sure this what you want?
I always kinda wanted to be a deputy, sheriff, marshal person.
translation.it: Ho sempre voluto essere un funzionario, uno sceriffo, un marshal.

translation.en: What you lookin' at?
We got work to do, Mr. Love.
translation.it: Abbiamo del lavoro da fare, sig. Love.

translation.en: Let's go.
All right.
♪ And upon my return ♪ ♪ You’ll see a changed soul ♪ ♪ The road was far too long ♪
translation.it: "IN MEMORIA DEI MIEI AMATI FRATELLI, RICHARD ANTWI E MICHAEL K. WILLIAMS"
